review: Dr..Chetan Bhambure is an outstanding cardiologist who truly cares about their patients' well-being. His expertise and thorough understanding of cardiovascular health are impressive, and he takes the time to explain diagnoses and treatment plans in a clear, reassuring manner. Dr..Chetan Bhambure is attentive, compassionate, and always listens to patient concerns, making everyone feel comfortable and confident in their care. I highly recommend Dr.Chetan Bhambure for anyone seeking excellent cardiac care.

Experience was really good. Dr Chetan bhambure is an experienced surgeon and did my surgery extremely well. Gave me a lot of after ops insights and to do's. The nursing and housekeeping staff were also prompt and responsive. Thank you doctor and wockhardt hospital mira road.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Chetan Bhambure thoroughness and clear communication I still confidence. I trust his advice and appreciate his commitment tonpatient well being. His thorough approach and caring demeanor make him an outstanding doctor. Highly recommend!!

I had visited the hospital. ****** *** ******* *** **** **** ** ******** *** I had heartbeat breathing related issue. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Experience was really good and he spoke well, my issue was resolved in 4-5 days. I had been twice and medical tests was also done. There was less waiting time in the hospital, it was for 15- 20 minutes. I am good now. I was admitted there too. Hospitality and staff was good. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor.

We had consulted the doctor as my wife was suffering from chest pain. It was not serious issue. Treatment was excellent and he guided us very well. He told nothing to worry about and prescribed medicines. She got better after that. Tests was not required, only medicines. The waiting time was only for 5 minutes. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends.

*** ** *** **** ************.
I visited him for my mother's ICD implantation.
Soft spoken and excellent treatment.

We had visited the hospital and it was health problem for my father in law. ********* *** *** I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment given, he is heart patient and it was regular checkup. There was not much waiting time in the hospital. It was for 15 minutes. He is ok now. He had chest pain. Angiography was suggested. And there is lot of procedure to do and it takes full day to do. Someone recommended to visit this doctor. Hospitality was good, cleanliness and staff is good. I have plans to do angiography for him.

We had been to hospital and it was for health issue for my mother. ****** *** ***** We wanted advice with doctor, it was for normal consultation. ECG was done. She was undergoing cancer treatment, to take chemo doctor wanted recommendation from cardiologist to know if heart is functioning fine. She is not good now. She is under medication, she passed certain stages. There was normal waiting time in the hospital.

I had heart related issue so went to hospital. ****** *** ***** I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I just had a normal consultation There was no waiting time in the hospital. I am good now. *********** *** *****
